name: Stellar (itch) (Virtual Bandits)
description:
A space exploration game set in a low-poly, surreal world.

Explore the environment as you fly through strange worlds, fight the Necronaut invasion and collect treasure.

Finalist in Sony Spain's Playstation Awards 2015, and nominated to 2 awards.

Team:

-Alejandro Monzú: 3D graphics

-Jesús Martínez: Programming

-Javier Guijarro: Visual effects
